description: This file defines the OrdersPage widget for a Flutter application, responsible for displaying user orders, creating new orders from the cart, and managing order status listings.

classes.name: OrdersPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of user orders or an empty state if there are none. It also provides a static method to place an order from the cart.

methods.name: placeOrderFromCart
methods.description: Creates an order from the current cart, adds it to the orders provider, clears the cart, and shows a confirmation message.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OrdersPage, displaying either the list of orders or an empty state.

methods.name: _statusChip
methods.description: Returns a Chip widget indicating the status of an order with corresponding label and color.
